solution.text:
given that k=\(\frac {44}7\)
on dividing we get, k=\(_{{trunc(2*Decimal(22)/Decimal(7),12)}}_\)
We see that at the decimal place 285714 is repeating
Hence we can say K is a rational number

content.text:
If radius of a circle is _{j}_cm it's circumference is measured to be _{{trunc(2*pi_val*j,6)}}_
if the radius is _{{j+2}}_cm it's circumference is _{{trunc(2*pi_val*(j+2),6)}}_cm
we see that circumference is proportional to the radius of the circle
using the given data it was found that k is the proportionality constant\(=\frac {44}7\).
find the decimal value of k and choose the correct statements

incorrect.text: In the value of k, the digits at decimal places are not repeating
